definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical value of supraglottic horizontal partial laryngectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討喉聲門上水平部分切除術的臨牀應用價值。

sentences.english: Conclusion Tibia fracture healing delays after ovariectomy.
sentences.chinese: 結論卵巢切除後，脛骨骨折癒合緩慢。

sentences.english: Delaying reimplantation till at least 6 months after resection.
sentences.chinese: 再次植入應在切除術後至少6個月。

sentences.english: There was no relapse after radical operation.
sentences.chinese: 行根治性手術切除後，未見覆發。

sentences.english: But on the excision throat nerve outside may cause patient's range to have the change.
sentences.chinese: 但切除喉上神經的外支可使患者的音域發生改變。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience of total gastrectomy for gastric carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析和總結胃癌全胃切除術治療經驗。

sentences.english: Surgery was curative in 54 patients and palliative in 27 patients.
sentences.chinese: 行胰十二指腸切除術54例，姑息性手術27例。

sentences.english: To investigate the factors affecting the incidence of positive surgical margin in partial laryngectomy.
sentences.chinese: 探討影響喉癌部分喉切除術陽性切緣發生的因素。

sentences.english: Subsequent excision and drainage were performed after antibiotic treatment.
sentences.chinese: 抗生素治療後進行切除和引流治療。

sentences.english: Both tumors were successfully resected without recurrence.
sentences.chinese: 二者皆經手術成功切除腫瘤且未再復發。

sentences.english: Objective To observe children ocular injury vitrectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價兒童眼外傷玻璃體切除術。

sentences.english: Transurethral resection of posterior lip of cervix vesicae is an effective therapeutic method.
sentences.chinese: 經尿道膀胱頸部後脣切除爲有效的治療方法。

sentences.english: Objective To conclude the experience from trabeculectomy under topical anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結表面麻醉下小梁切除術的體會。

sentences.english: Hyoid bone and arytenoid cartilages were resected and cricoid cartilage anastomosis with the base of the tongue and submental muscles.
sentences.chinese: 常規切除舌骨將環狀軟骨與舌根及頦下肌肉吻合。

sentences.english: Method : the bank of muscle contraction is resected or only cut off in order to relax the muscle.
sentences.chinese: 方法將攣縮帶切除鬆解或單純切斷鬆解。

sentences.english: Excision of semilunar cartilage of knee joint.
sentences.chinese: 膝閉節半月硬骨切除術。

definition: biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]
